00080 # MicropolisGaugeView
00081 
00082 
00083 class MicropolisGaugeView(micropolisview.MicropolisView):
00084 
00085 
00086     gap = 5
00087 
00088     barHeight = 20
00089 
00090     colWidth = 10
00091     colHeight = 25
00092     colGap = 5
00093 
00094     viewWidth = 150
00095     viewHeight = (2 * gap) + (2 * colHeight) + barHeight
00096 
00097 
00098     def __init__(
00099         self,
00100         **args):
00101 
00102         micropolisview.MicropolisView.__init__(
00103             self,
00104             interests=('demand', 'date', 'funds',),
00105             **args)
00106 
00107         self.zoomable = False
00108 
00109         self.set_size_request(self.viewWidth, self.viewHeight)
00110 
00111 
00112     def update(
00113         self,
00114         name,
00115         *args):
00116 
00117         #print "GAUGE VIEW UPDATE", self, name, args
00118 
00119         self.queue_draw()
00120 
00121 
00122     # TODO: Internationalize
00123     def getMonthName(self, monthIndex):
00124         return [
00125             "Jan",
00126             "Feb",
00127             "Mar",
00128             "Apr",
00129             "May",
00130             "Jun",
00131             "Jul",
00132             "Aug",
00133             "Sep",
00134             "Oct",
00135             "Nov",
00136             "Dec",
00137         ][monthIndex];
00138 
00139 
00140     def getCityDate(self):
00141         engine = self.engine
00142         return (
00143             self.getMonthName(engine.cityMonth) +
00144             ' ' +
00145             str(engine.cityYear))
00146 
00147 
00148     def drawContent(
00149         self,
00150         ctx,
00151         playout):
00152 
00153         #print "==== MicropolisGaugeView DRAWCONTENT", self
00154 
00155         engine = self.engine
00156 
00157         # Measure window.
00158 
00159         winRect = self.get_allocation()
00160         winWidth = winRect.width
00161         winHeight = winRect.height
00162 
00163         # Draw window.
00164 
00165         ctx.save()
00166 
00167         playout.set_font_description(self.labelFont)
00168 
00169         # Draw background.
00170 
00171         ctx.rectangle(0, 0, winWidth, winHeight)
00172         ctx.set_source_rgb(0.9, 0.9, 1.0)
00173         ctx.clip_preserve()
00174         ctx.fill_preserve()
00175         ctx.set_source_rgb(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00176         ctx.set_line_width(2)
00177         ctx.stroke()
00178 
00179         # Measure bar.
00180 
00181         colWidth = self.colWidth
00182         colHeight = self.colHeight
00183         colGap = self.colGap
00184 
00185         gap = self.gap
00186         barHeight = self.barHeight
00187         barWidth = (4 * colGap) + (3 * colWidth)
00188         barX = gap
00189         barY = gap + colHeight
00190 
00191         # Measure columns.
00192 
00193         rColX = barX + colGap
00194         cColX = rColX + colWidth + colGap
00195         iColX = cColX + colWidth + colGap
00196 
00197         resDemand, comDemand, indDemand = engine.getDemands()
00198         #print "RES", resDemand, "COM", comDemand, "IND", indDemand
00199 
00200         res = -resDemand * colHeight
00201         com = -comDemand * colHeight
00202         ind = -indDemand * colHeight
00203 
00204         # Draw columns.
00205 
00206         ctx.set_line_width(2)
00207 
00208         if res != 0:
00209             if res < 0:
00210                 y = barY + res
00211                 h = -res
00212             else:
00213                 y = barY + barHeight
00214                 h = res
00215 
00216             ctx.rectangle(rColX, y, colWidth, h)
00217             ctx.set_source_rgb(0.0, 0.0, 0.0) # Black.
00218             ctx.stroke_preserve()
00219             ctx.set_source_rgb(0.0, 1.0, 0.0) # Green.
00220             ctx.fill()
00221 
00222         if com != 0:
00223             if com < 0:
00224                 y = barY + com
00225                 h = -com
00226             else:
00227                 y = barY + barHeight
00228                 h = com
00229 
00230             ctx.rectangle(cColX, y, colWidth, h)
00231             ctx.set_source_rgb(0.0, 0.0, 0.0) # Black.
00232             ctx.stroke_preserve()
00233             ctx.set_source_rgb(0.0, 0.0, 1.0) # Blue.
00234             ctx.fill()
00235 
00236         if ind != 0:
00237             if ind < 0:
00238                 y = barY + ind
00239                 h = -ind
00240             else:
00241                 y = barY + barHeight
00242                 h = ind
00243 
00244             ctx.rectangle(iColX, y, colWidth, h)
00245             ctx.set_source_rgb(0.0, 0.0, 0.0) # Black.
00246             ctx.stroke_preserve()
00247             ctx.set_source_rgb(1.0, 1.0, 0.0) # Yellow.
00248             ctx.fill()
00249 
00250         # Draw bar.
00251 
00252         ctx.save()
00253 
00254         ctx.rectangle(barX, barY, barWidth, barHeight)
00255         ctx.set_source_rgb(1.0, 1.0, 1.0)
00256         ctx.clip_preserve()
00257         ctx.fill_preserve()
00258         ctx.set_source_rgb(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00259         ctx.set_line_width(2)
00260         ctx.stroke()
00261         ctx.restore()
00262 
00263         # Draw text on bar.
00264 
00265         def centerText(text, x, y):
00266             textX, textY = self.pinMarkupXY(
00267                 text, x, y, 0.5, 0.5, playout)
00268             ctx.move_to(textX, textY)
00269             ctx.show_layout(playout)
00270 
00271         ctx.set_source_rgb(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00272 
00273         cy = barY + (barHeight / 2) + 1
00274         centerText('<b>R</b>', rColX + (colWidth / 2), cy)
00275         centerText('<b>C</b>', cColX + (colWidth / 2), cy)
00276         centerText('<b>I</b>', iColX + (colWidth / 2), cy)
00277 
00278         # Finish drawing gauge.
00279 
00280         ctx.restore()
00281 
00282         # Draw text.
00283 
00284         ctx.save()
00285 
00286         textX = barX + barWidth + gap
00287         textY = gap
00288         textWidth = winWidth - (textX + gap)
00289         textHeight = winHeight - (textY + gap)
00290 
00291         ctx.translate(textX, textY)
00292 
00293         markup = (
00294             "<span><b>Date:</b>\n%s\n\n<b>Funds:</b>\n%s\n</span>" % (
00295             self.getCityDate(),
00296             '$' + engine.formatNumber(engine.totalFunds),
00297         ))
00298 
00299         ctx.set_source_rgb(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00300         playout.set_markup(markup)
00301         ctx.move_to(0, 0)
00302         ctx.show_layout(playout)
00303 
00304         # Finish drawing window.
00305 
00306         ctx.restore()
00307 
00308

00312 
00313         pass
00314

00317         self,

00319 
00320         pass

00324         self,
00325         widget,
00326         event):
00327 
00328         pass
